articles.content: Dividend stock 2023:Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd (HAL) stocks will be in focus today as it is one of the dividend paying stocks that is going to trade ex-bonus today. The board of directors of the compa… [+2065 chars]

articles.author: Sunil Shankar Matkar
articles.title: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with Sun TV Network, Suzlon Energy, Quess Corp today - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Quess Corp rose 4.7 percent to Rs 420.80 and formed long bullish candlestick pattern on the daily timeframe with above average volumes, continuing uptrend for second straight session, after consistent downtrend in previous 10 days in a row.
articles.content: The market ended exactly on the downward sloping resistance trendline, which comes in between 19,450-19,500 levels, with continuing higher highs formation for third consecutive session on August 23. … [+3813 chars]

articles.title: Coming on heels of a merger, HDFC Bank now hit most by RBI's liquidity-draining move - The Economic Times
articles.description: RBIs imposition of an incremental cash reserve ratio will lead to the impounding of deposits that weighed on the banking stocks. Since the announcement, the Nifty Bank Index has shed nearly 2% as against Nifty 50s 1.2% fall (August 22 data), while HDFC Bank h…

articles.author: Rituraj Baruah, Saurav Anand
articles.title: Run on full capacity till 31 Oct, ICB plants told | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The original directive on this was issued in February when ICB plants were asked to run at full capacity till 15 June.
articles.content: NEW DELHI : Amid rising demand, the Union ministry of power on Wednesday directed imported coal-based (ICB) power plants to operate at full capacity till the end of October.The original directive on … [+1119 chars]

articles.title: Adani group shares lose about Rs 5 lakh crore market cap - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The total market capitalization of Adani group shares was Rs 11.47 lakh crore on August 22 and it ended up on Rs 10.93 lakh crore on August 23.
articles.content: Adani group shares lost almost Rs 50,000 crore market capitalisation on August 23 with all scrips ending in the red. While Adani companies went down, the Nifty ended up in the green, rising by 0.25 p… [+814 chars]
